alert.note: Alert for Cass (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 23 at 7:49PM CDT until September 23 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Missouri, including the following county, Cass. * WHEN...Until midnight CDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 749 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2.5 and 4.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kansas City, Lee`s Summit, Belton, Raymore, Harrisonville, Pleasant Hill, Peculiar, Garden City, Lake Winnebago, Cleveland, Freeman, East Lynne, Lake Annette, Baldwin Park and West Line. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
